description:
Head to the mountains in a pack that's one-of-a-kind, just like you. The Tarak is super versatile in the backcountry, with a hydration sleeve, low-bulk shoulder straps and removable waist belt, so you can go from day hiking to multipitch climbing, and even backcountry skiing. As part of Cotopaxi's Del Día collection, it's made with remnant materials – so the people who sew it have creative control over its final look. No two packs are alike.

  • Made of durable, lightweight ripstop nylon sourced from fabric remnants
  • Low-profile shoulder straps and a removable webbing waistbelt reduce weight and bulk
  • Cushy foam back panel can be removed to save weight, or to double as a seat pad on cold, rough ground
  • Large main compartment has an internal hydration sleeve
  • Zippered pockets on the front and lid keep your phone, sunnies and wallet safe
  • External compression straps, lash points, and ice axe loops let you attach extra gear on the outside
  • Since each pack is unique, the colours on your pack may differ from those in the image. Sorry, we can’t accommodate specific colour requests (embrace the uncertainty)
name: Cotopaxi Tarak 20L Daypack - Del Dia - Unisex
